en.title: Professional Experience
en.subtitle: A rich career journey in application and system development

experiences.title: Full Stack Development Technical Leader | Mobile Application Architect
experiences.company: Federal Authority for Government Human Resources (FAHR)
experiences.description: Leading multinational development team for advanced AI and HR applications. Achieved 40% efficiency improvement through OpenAI and FAISS integration.
highlights: Led FAHR Smart App modernization, migrating from Angular 7 to React Native for better performance
Developed and launched AI-powered virtual assistant, integrating voice and LLM capabilities
Managed 10 major & 6 minor app releases (4.0.0 â€“ 4.8.0), introducing new self-service features
Optimized security & infrastructure, closing vulnerabilities, renewing SSL/APN certificates, and scaling servers
Created an evaluation model using Python to assess and validate AI models' performance
Developed digital community for Government employees

experiences.title: Full Stack Development Technical Leader
experiences.description: Developed mobile application for ports and customs users, enhancing operational efficiency. Built internal portal with multiple workflows.
highlights: Conducted detailed analysis of business requirements and designed scalable application architectures
Developed a mobile application for ports and customs users, enhancing operational efficiency
Built an internal portal with multiple workflows to streamline business processes
Ensured high user satisfaction by implementing error monitoring and proactive support strategies
Integrated external third-party systems via web services and APIs for seamless interoperability

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description: Developed Headless CMS for mobile application content and UI management. Revamped e-Ajman Mobile App from AngularJS to React Native.
highlights: Conducted detailed analysis of business requirements and designed scalable application architectures
Developed a Headless CMS for mobile application content and UI management
Revamped the e-Ajman Mobile App, migrating from AngularJS to React Native with improved design and features
Developed critical solutions such as Himma Web App, AjmanPay integration, and UAE Pass authentication
Assisted vendors with AI component integration for Ajman Mobility services

experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Led the merging of multiple RTA mobile applications into a unified platform. Developed critical payment solutions including Apple Pay, ePay, mPay.
highlights: Led the merging of multiple RTA mobile applications into a unified platform
Revamped RTA mobile applications with improved design, enhanced features, and modern technologies
Developed critical payment solutions including Apple Pay, ePay, mPay, and UAE Pass login integration
Assisted vendors with RTA Smart Mobility services, providing technical guidance and support
Integrated third-party systems via web services and APIs for seamless interoperability

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developed mobile applications supporting e-Traffic and public transportation business. Optimized application performance, security, and scalability.
highlights: Developed mobile applications supporting e-Traffic and public transportation business
Optimized application performance, security, and scalability by identifying bottlenecks and memory leaks
Led code refactoring and reviews, improving system performance by over 10x
Mentored team members to enhance technical skills and software development best practices

experiences.title: Cross-Platform Software Developer
experiences.description: Designed and implemented cross-platform applications for e-banking, e-insurance, and e-trading businesses. Developed prototypes that secured new contracts for the company.
highlights: Designed and implemented cross-platform applications for e-banking, e-insurance, and e-trading businesses
Developed prototypes that secured new contracts for the company
Participated in the full software development lifecycle, from analysis to deployment
Provided on-site support and troubleshooting for high-profile organizations like Al Rajhi Bank
Trained new employees on code standards and software best practices

experiences.title: Android Applications Instructor
experiences.description: Trained two teams on Android SDK and advanced Android application development. Provided hands-on workshops covering UI/UX, database integration, and API consumption.
highlights: Trained two teams on Android SDK and advanced Android application development
Provided hands-on workshops covering UI/UX, database integration, and API consumption
Assisted students in developing functional Android applications as final projects
